info.name: Project Catalog API copy
info.description:
# Introduction
Using the CRUD-model this API allows users to moderate categories and items for the Catalog.

# Overview
Project Catalog is the second project of the Full Stack Web Developer Nanodegree at Udacity.

# Authentication
GET requests are publicly available.
All other requests requires a free login.

# Error Codes
Empty objects will be returned, if no results are found.

# Rate limit
Currently, not in place, but will soon be updated
